Layers¶

class ComplexDense¶
Fully connected complex-valued layer

Implements the operation:

\[\sigma(\textrm{input * weights + bias})\]

  • where data types can be either complex or real.

  • activation (\(\sigma\)) is the element-wise activation function passed as the activation argument,

  • weights is a matrix created by the layer

  • bias is a bias vector created by the layer

__init__(self,
input_size,
output_size,
activation=None,
input_dtype=np.complex64,
output_dtype=np.complex64,
weight_initializer=tf.keras.initializers.GlorotUniform,
bias_initializer=tf.keras.initializers.Zeros
)

Initializer of the Dense layer

Parameters

  • input_size – Input size of the layer

  • output_size – Output size of the layer

  • activation – Activation function to be used. Can be either the function from activation_functions or tensorflow.python.keras.activations or a string as listed in act_dispatcher

  • input_dtype –

    data type of the input.

    Default: np.complex64

    Note

    Supported data types:

    • np.complex64

    • np.float32

  • output_dtype – data type of the output function. Default: np.complex64

  • weight_initializer – Initializer for the weights. Default: tensorflow.keras.initializers.GlorotUniform

  • bias_initializer – Initializer fot the bias. Default: tensorflow.keras.initializers.Zeros
